STATE
v.
HOLT. No. COA07-435. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed January 15, 2008. Certification Date February 4, 2008. Appeal from Mecklenburg (04CRS228184, 04CRS228185, 04CRS228186, 04CRS228188, 04CRS228189, 04CRS228190, 04CRS228191, 04CRS228192).
